it.polimi.se2018.server.model.Cards

Class ToolCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.server.model.Cards.ToolCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ToolCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class ToolCard: the class represents a tool card in the game model, it's characterized by a name and a color useful for the single player mode. Every tool card has a number,a cost and a usage associated with them, that depends on the state of the game
    Author:
    fadda-miceli-mundo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
